xmlns="http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/persistence" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/persistence http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/persistence/persistence_2_1.xsd" version="2.1">
SELECT p.plate_number as 'plateNumber', m.name as 'mechanicName', m.surname as 'mechanicSurname' FROM plane p left join mechanic m on JSON_CONTAINS(JSON_EXTRACT(p.maintenances, '$[*].mechanic_id' ), CAST(m.id as JSON))=1;
